description.full: What happens when humans gain access to powerful alien technology they were never meant to have?  Find out by playing the Fuse demo and enter a world where a private military corporation has stolen a volatile energy source, and the CIA has called in an elite contact team to retrieve it: Overstrike 9.  Join up to three friends in co-op play as you deploy lethal teamwork and fringe-tech weapons to invade a remote enemy stronghold and stop the theft of the volatile alien substance called Fuse.
description.short: Play the Fuse demo and join up to three friends in co-op play as you deploy lethal teamwork and fringe-tech weapons to invade a remote enemy stronghold and stop the theft of a volatile alien substance.
